name: SalamCastPlayer
tagline: SalamCast Podcast Player, Podcasting made peaceful
body:
## SalamCast Podcast Player

Well the SalamCast podcast player is a javascript/jQuery plugin that just deals with the RSS format,
all feeds had to be local files or local domain resources. ProxyCast is a PHP class to download podcasts
from a remote server so content can be played locally on your web server with this plugin.

The Demo will have some podcast configured to show you how it works with feeds you have no control over.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
